text: 5Action is a British action channel. The channel was originally called Paramount Network but was later changed to 5Action. Paramount Network launched July 4th 2018. On 7 January 2020, 5Spike closed and most of it's shows moved to Paramount Network. On 19 January 2022, Paramount Network changed to 5Action to stop confusion with Paramount+. == Sources == Category:British television
title: 5Action
